author: gdaniels
msg: * Add SOAPEnvelope field to keep track of current schema version,
and set namespaces based on that.  Add appropriate constructors.

author: gdaniels
msg: Add SOAP 1.2 "no encoding" encoding style URI

author: dims
msg: Patch for Bug 13819 - Attachment temp files never get removed
- Now DIME will exhibit same behavior as MIME (file will be created if size > (16 * 1024))
- We still have to fix the bug

author: jmsnell
msg: Adding DefaultSOAP12TypeMappingImpl back to fix backwards compatibility with Axis 1.0
DefaultSOAP12TypeMappingImpl extends DefaultSOAPEncodingTypeMappingImpl and carries the @depreciated tag

author: dims
msg: Fix for 15685 - namespaces are truncated in conversion to java packages
